name: Prize Catcher
description:
It's time to catch some prizes with PRIZE CATCHER!

Simply press the space bar button to catch your prizes. If you catch all of the prizes listed, you win! But be careful, catch the wrong item and lose a life.

Audio Citations:

“Error_02.Wav by Distillerystudio.” Freesound, freesound.org/people/distillerystudio/sounds/327737/.

“Shiny Coin Pickup by Plasterbrain.” Freesound, freesound.org/people/plasterbrain/sounds/608431/.
